attributes.action: Not have to wear long knee skirts in British high schools.
attributes.additional_details: Because it ruins all girls self esteem as they have to go to school everyday and don’t want to go dressed horribly. That’s why I’m reaching out to you so us girls can feel safer and prettier while we’re on school grounds.
attributes.background: To contact all off British high schools and not let them make us girls wear knee lengh skirts. They make people feel ugly and ruins their self esteem.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about school uniforms are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Suspend school uniform for 12 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621824
